last_episode_to_air.name: The Ouroboros: Every End Holds a New Beginning
last_episode_to_air.overview: The finale is here but brings a cruel twist. As the Escaype Live team struggles to balance morality and business, a dark horse emerges, turning the game on its head.

name: Escaype Live
overview: The different journeys of six regular people as they struggle to win, fame and fortune on a social media app called Escaype Live which promises big money to the winning contestant. Will the lines between the real and virtual begin to blur as they gear up for the contest?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A live streaming app announces a contest, promising instant fame and fortune to its most popular user. However everything comes at a great cost...

episodes.name: The Game Begins
episodes.overview: A contest promising 3 crores transforms the lives of 5 ordinary Indians, opening a Pandora's box of human ambition, as a morally high-strung moderator grapples with his new reality.

episodes.name: Follow/Like/Love
episodes.overview: The "face-offs" get hotter as the lust for money makes the contestants put everything on the line. But are the rules of the game as simple as they seem?

episodes.name: #NoFilter
episodes.overview: A new player is unveiled as Fetish's secret identity gets unmasked by her boss. Moreover, Krishna discovers information that threatens the very existence of the competition.

episodes.name: Cheat Code
episodes.overview: Darkie's wild feed skyrockets on the charts as he plans the deadliest party yet. The stakes rise as Spider makes a fatal mistake, and Krishna decides to expose his company's secret.

episodes.name: Bhram
episodes.overview: Greed and lust for fame lead to an accident on a live feed, putting Escaype Live under heavy scrutiny. Krishna breaks the rules of the game but ends up uncovering skeletons of his own.

episodes.name: Search for the Truth
episodes.overview: As Aamcha Spider battles a broken spirit, Fetish Girl formulates a plan. Dance Rani continues rising to the top, but someone with a sinister plan may foil Escaype's best-laid plans.

episodes.name: Nautanki
episodes.overview: With the clock ticking on an unforgiving game, a top user backs out and Fetish seeks Krishna's help to win. Darkie goes on the run, and Rani's innocent act makes all hell breaks loose!

episodes.name: #EndGame
episodes.overview: The users pull out all stops in a desperate bid to win the grand prize as Rani's secret admirer turns foe. Meena tops the charts, and Krishna finds an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: The Ouroboros: Every End Holds a New Beginning
episodes.overview: The finale is here but brings a cruel twist. As the Escaype Live team struggles to balance morality and business, a dark horse emerges, turning the game on its head.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A live streaming app announces a contest, promising instant fame and fortune to its most popular user. However everything comes at a great cost...
